001package imagingbook.lib.filter;
002
003import imagingbook.lib.image.data.PixelPack;
004
005public abstract class GenericFilterVector extends GenericFilter {
006
007        private int iter = 0;
008        private int iterMax = 1;        // for progress reporting only
009        
010        @Override 
011        protected void runPass(PixelPack sourcePack, PixelPack targetPack) {
012                final int width = sourcePack.getWidth();
013                final int height = sourcePack.getHeight();
014                iterMax = width * height;
015                iter = 0;
016                for (int v = 0; v < height; v++) {
017                        for (int u = 0; u < width; u++) {
018                                targetPack.setPixel(u, v, doPixel(sourcePack, u, v)); // single pixel operation
019                                iter++;
020                        }
021                }
022                iter = 0;
023        }
024        
025        // calculate the result vector for a single pixel
026        
027        protected abstract float[] doPixel(PixelPack source, int u, int v);
028        
029        // -----------------------------------------------------------------
030        
031        // helper method for copying vector pixels, TODO: should move to Utils or so
032        public void copyPixel(float[] source, float[] target) {
033                System.arraycopy(source, 0, target, 0, source.length);
034        }
035        
036        @Override
037        protected final double reportProgress(double subProgress) {
038                double localProgress = (double) iter /iterMax;
039                //System.out.println("GenericFilterVector: reportProgress() - returning " + localProgress);
040                return super.reportProgress(localProgress);
041        }
042
043}
